SELECT b.board_no boardNo ,b.member_id memberId ,t.teacher_name teacherName ,s.student_name studentName ,b.board_title boardTitle ,b.board_content boardContent ,b.private_no privateNo ,b.create_date createDate ,b.update_date updateDate FROM board b LEFT JOIN teacher t ON t.member_id = b.member_id LEFT JOIN student s ON s.member_id = b.member_id WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
